title: "Source"
marks: Signature and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Toko Shinoda]; LRC, in pencil: [S
description: dark columnar form  with light and dark areas, rising through center of sheet; linear forms slicing from figure into negative space: two at top and bottom R side extending downward, and two on L side extending upward; horizontal dark block extending at LL into columnar figure
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Gene Perrine
